laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver enhances homogeneously without focal lesions. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation. Kidneys enhance and excrete contrast symmetrically without evidence of hydroureteronephrosis. Moderate thickening of the wall of the distal descending colon with adjacent pericolonic fat stranding. Colonic diverticulosis is seen, particularly of the sigmoid colon. No intra-abdominal free fluid or drainable abscess.
